name: The Adventures of Jimmy
description:
• Story

In The Adventures of Jimmy, your purpose is to find the time machine in the abandoned lab. You are doing this to go back in time and change the past in order to prevent something bad happening to your friend. Throughout the levels, you will need to collect tools in order to move past obstacles, and you can collect as many screws as you can along the way. You will need at least 20 to reach the basement though.

  • Controls

A, D - Move left and right

Space - Jump

W, S - Climb Ladders

Enter- Use your tool

E - Open the tool wheel

Arrow Keys - Choose your tool from the tool wheel
